articles.title: Military AI revolution heightens competition for defence tech contracts: Peter Apps
articles.summary: In London‚Äôs Shoreditch district, long home to UK tech start-ups, a French artificial intelligence firm is crunching data that would have allowed Ukrainian commanders to more quickly counter Russia‚Äôs 2022 full-scale invasion.

articles.title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom in 2026, FT reports
articles.summary: OpenAI is set to produce its first artificial intelligence chip next year in partnership with U.S. semiconductor giant Broadcom , the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the partnership.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom in 2026, FT reports

articles.title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom, FT reports
articles.summary: OpenAI is set to produce its own artificial intelligence chip for the first time next year, as the ChatGPT maker attempts to address insatiable demand for computing power and reduce its reliance on chip giant Nvidia , the Financial Times reported on Thursday.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI set to start mass production of its own AI chips with Broadcom, FT reports

articles.title: Big tech signs on to White House plan for AI education in US schools
articles.summary: The White House hosted several tech and AI leaders at an event today centered on teaching artificial intelligence in US schools.

articles.title: Broadcom sees strong AI growth for fiscal 2026 on new customer addition
articles.summary: Broadcom expects artificial intelligence revenue growth for fiscal 2026 to "improve significantly", after securing more than $10 billion in AI infrastructure orders from a new customer, CEO Hock Tan said on Thursday.

articles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery Sues Midjourney for Copyright Infringement
articles.summary: The lawsuit against Midjourney was filed as a growing contingent of Hollywood steps into the fight over generative artificial intelligence.

articles.title: White House cuts to science funding threaten AI weather forecasting institute
articles.summary: The Trump administration is halting funding for a $20 million artificial intelligence (AI) institute designed to improve weather forecasting, a move that could sever a pipeline of scientists from receiving training while also hampering the country‚Äôs ability to assess the impacts of hurricanes and other weather disasters.

articles.title: OpenAI Plans Jobs Platform, Certification Program for AI Roles
articles.summary: OpenAI plans to launch a new AI-powered jobs platform next year to help match employers with candidates who have artificial intelligence skills in a bid to accelerate the technology‚Äôs deployment across businesses and government agencies.

articles.title: Melania Trump reemerges to highlight responsible AI: ‚ÄòThe robots are here‚Äô
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump made rare public remarks on Thursday, calling on private and public sector leaders to prepare children for the growth of artificial intelligence, at a Thursday event at the White House.
